title: FOOD RECIPE APP
pitch: Say goodbye to food waste and hello to Foodie - your ultimate food app for using what you already have in your pantry!

title: PLANNER APP
pitch: A simple planner app that allows users to save events and tasks for the day or week.

title: QUIZ GAME
pitch: The quiz game comprises five questions centered around general knowledge.

title: WEATHER DASHBOARD
pitch: A comprehensive weather forecast application that displays both the current weather and a 5-day forecast.

title: EMPLOYEE INFORMATION
pitch: This application will gather information about employees on a software engineering team and generate an HTML webpage displaying summaries for each person.

title: BOOTSTRAP PORTFOLIO
pitch: Within this project, I've extensively explored the Bootstrap framework, meticulously crafting a responsive design adaptable across laptops and mobile devices.

title: TRENDOO
pitch: Trendoo was invented as a trendy, avant garde fashion label known for its innovative designs and cutting-edge styles.
